alert.note: Alert for Chase; Frontier; Hayes (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 22 at 2:24PM CDT until July 22 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CDT /11 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory today, heat index values up to 100 expected. For the Heat Advisory Saturday, heat index values up to 104 expected. * WHERE...Chase, Hayes and Frontier Counties. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory today, from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ this evening. For the Heat Advisory Saturday, from noon CDT /11 AM MDT/ to 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.
